title: Classic sponge cake
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons cold water', '150g sugar', '4 eggs, separated', '200g cornflour, sieved', '2 tablespoons self-raising flour, sieved', '1 tsp vanilla extract', 'Your choice of whipped cream to fill (lovely if flavoured with vanilla)', 'Your choice of jam to fill (I love jam with big bits of fruit to bite into)', 'Icing sugar, to dust cake']
